    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>09862aec-1534-11d8-9145-fb99b4189e3e</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Kultúrák találkozása a kora újkorban</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Meeting Of Cultures In The Early Modern Times</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sitzung Der Kulturen In den Frühen Modernen 
Zeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Réunion des Cultures Dans Les Temps Modernes 
Tôt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Reunião Das Culturas Nos Tempos Modernos 
Adiantados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Riunione Delle Colture Nei Tempi Moderni In 
anticipo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συνεδρίαση των πολιτισμών στους πρόωρους σύγχρονους 
χρόνους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Reunión De Culturas En Los Tiempos Modernos 
Tempranos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A nagy földrajzi felfedezések következtében előállt kulturális érintkezések, keveredés, kiszorítás, kölcsönhatások</string>
            <string language="en-US">Appeared as a result of the big geographical discoveries cultural contacts, mixing, displacement, interactions</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">történelem</string>
            <string language="en-US">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">gyarmatosítás</string>
            <string language="en-US">colonization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kulturális keveredés</string>
            <string language="en-US">mixing of cultures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">akkulturáció</string>
            <string language="en-US">Acculturation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geerschienen resultierend aus den kulturellen 
Kontakten der grossen geographischen Entdeckungen, mischend, 
Distanzadresse, Interaktionen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apparu en raison des contacts culturels de 
grandes découvertes géographiques, se mélangeant, déplacement, 
interactions</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aparecido em conseqüência dos contatos cultural
das descobertas geográficas grandes, misturando, deslocamento, 
interações</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comparso come conseguenza dei contatti culturali 
di scoperte geografiche grandi, mescolanti, spostamento, interazioni</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμφανισμένος ως αποτέλεσμα των μεγάλων γεωγραφικών 
πολιτιστικών επαφών ανακαλύψεων, μίξη, μετατόπιση, 
αλληλεπιδράσεις</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aparecido como resultado de los contactos 
culturales de los descubrimientos geográficos grandes, mezclándose, 
dislocación, interacciones</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Besiedlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischen der Kulturen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kulturübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colonisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mélange des cultures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acculturation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colonização</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">misturar das culturas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acculturation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colonizzazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">miscelazione delle colture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acculturazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αποίκιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μίξη των πολιτισμών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενσωμάτωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colonización</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">el mezclarse de culturas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aculturación</string>
          </keyword>
